entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `anta` TEXT NOT NULL, `word` TEXT NOT NULL, `sound` TEXT NOT NULL, `gender` TEXT NOT NULL, `meaning` TEXT NOT NULL, `category` TEXT NOT NULL, `translit` TEXT NOT NULL, `translit_normalized` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `is_favorite` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `favorite_since` INTEGER, `visit_count` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `last_visited` INTEGER, `declension` TEXT NOT NULL)
CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` USING FTS4(`word` TEXT NOT NULL, `translit` TEXT NOT NULL, `translit_normalized` TEXT NOT NULL, `meaning` TEXT NOT NULL, content=`sabda`)
contentSyncTriggers: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_sabda_fts_BEFORE_UPDATE BEFORE UPDATE ON `sabda` BEGIN DELETE FROM `sabda_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_sabda_fts_BEFORE_DELETE BEFORE DELETE ON `sabda` BEGIN DELETE FROM `sabda_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_sabda_fts_AFTER_UPDATE AFTER UPDATE ON `sabda` BEGIN INSERT INTO `sabda_fts`(`docid`, `word`, `translit`, `translit_normalized`, `meaning`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`word`, NEW.`translit`, NEW.`translit_normalized`, NEW.`meaning`); END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_sabda_fts_AFTER_INSERT AFTER INSERT ON `sabda` BEGIN INSERT INTO `sabda_fts`(`docid`, `word`, `translit`, `translit_normalized`, `meaning`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`word`, NEW.`translit`, NEW.`translit_normalized`, NEW.`meaning`); END

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
INSERT OR REPLACE INTO room_master_table (id,identity_hash) VALUES(42, 'e6885410bb2b2d998c4b9460618c316b')
